Unions built the middle class, and unions will rebuild the middle class. Thank you @IowaAFLCIO for having me today. I’m proud to stand with America’s workers. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EChMiSXWsAA2KO4.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EChMiSNXYAUnomc.jpg

The middle class is disappearing, the gap between the very rich and everyone else is growing wider, and Trump is making it worse.

As president I'm going to do the exact opposite.

Unlike Trump, I stand with workers. And I'm going to take on the billionaire class. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EChhW7bXoAEirwi.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1164282405185826818/vid/320x320/QmZEa4k4uG0fLIdL.mp4?tag=13

In December Trump shut down the government for 35 days, depriving over 800,000 workers of pay and forcing many to work without pay.

That cannot happen again.

Federal employees must be guaranteed the same rights as workers in the private sector—including the right to strike.

For centuries, America’s rise relied on treating Black people as literal property. "Slavery By Another Name" continued well into the 20th century. I believe we should talk about this part of our history, and learn about how it has shaped every aspect of our politics and economy. https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1163946319720984576 QT @nytimes 400 years ago, a ship carrying more than 20 enslaved Africans arrived in the English colony of Virginia. The #1619Project explores how the years of slavery that followed still shape America today. https://trib.al/uYtDNlk

RT @FlyingWithSara If federal workers had the right to strike none of us would have been subjected to that reckless, mean-spirited Shutdown - and lockout of another million people doing contract work - that put all of us and our entire economy in danger. Labor rights = safety, security, sanity. #1u https://twitter.com/berniesanders/status/1164191120353574912 QT @BernieSanders In December Trump shut down the government for 35 days, depriving over 800,000 workers of pay and forcing many to work without pay.

That cannot happen again.

Federal employees must be guaranteed the same rights as workers in the private sector—including the right to strike.

If the richest Americans do not start paying their fair share of taxes, we are headed for a future where they control all of the wealth and the rest of the country has none. All of it.

To me, that is outrageous and that is not what America is about. https://www.dallasnews.com/business/personal-finance/2019/08/04/rate-rich-could-truly-just-33-years-now

I’ve said it once and I’ll say it as many times as I have to, we HAVE to cut spending. https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/politics-news/federal-deficit-swell-800-billion-over-next-decade-new-cbo-n1044821

Here’s the deal: In the past 3 years @WellsFargo has sworn up & down that it’s changed – & it’s been caught scamming customers & lying to regulators in more than a dozen ways. Fake accounts. Unneeded auto insurance fees. Wrongful foreclosures & repossessed cars. Enough is enough.

Let’s be absolutely clear about what this is: an attempt to prevent families and children from seeking asylum by threatening to lock them away for indefinite periods of time.

This isn't who we are. We must continue to fight this administration's cruel agenda. https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1164169616022749185 QT @nytimes Breaking News: A new Trump administration rule would allow the U.S. to indefinitely detain families who cross the border illegally, abolishing a 20-day limit. https://trib.al/mgBQSNL

The Flores agreement mandates that migrant children cannot be held in detention for more than 20 days. Today, the Trump administration announced its plans to roll back Flores—putting thousands of children in danger. We must fight this. https://twitter.com/FIRM_Action/status/1164195501820043266 QT @FIRM_Action The Flores agreement has protected migrant children from indefinite detention for decades. We reject the administration’s dangerous attempt to jail children indefinitely and weaken protections! https://www.nytimes.com/2019/08/20/us/flores-migrant-children-detention.html

RT @GunnelsWarren .@BernieSanders historic pro-union plan:

✅Doubles union workers
✅Gives workers the right to strike
✅Provides workers the freedom to negotiate
✅Raises wages across industries
✅Protects pensions
✅Ends contracts to union busters
✅Ends "right to work" https://berniesanders.com/the-workplace-democracy-plan/

My Workplace Democracy Plan will:
✅ Double union membership
✅ End "right to work"
✅ End union busting
✅ Protect striking rights for ALL workers
✅ Protect union-negotiated benefits under Medicare for All

Together we will rebuild the middle class. https://berniesanders.com/the-workplace-democracy-plan/
